job_tasks.phrase: Determining requirements for the application of data science methods to business questions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into data science requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying new business opportunities using data science methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the requirement to leverage data science to discover and capitalize on business prospects.

job_tasks.phrase: Using advanced analytical and machine learning methods to extract value from business data
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activity of applying ML techniques to derive insights from data, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Building data-driven models and reports to generate consumer insight and help Damen Digital Solutions address product development challenges
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building models and reports for specific business objectives, aligning with the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Contributing to the Damen analytical tools
job_tasks.justification: This suggests involvement in the development or enhancement of software tools used for analytics.

soft_skills.phrase: Giving insights to product-teams through presentation of data-driven recommendations
strong support from fellow dedicated team members
support you to develop yourself in this position
help Damen Digital Solutions address product development challenges

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'advanced analytical and machine learning methods to extract value from business data' and 'building data-driven models and reports'. While there's some mention of contributing to tools, the core focus remains on applying ML to business problems and generating insights, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on predictive modeling and data analysis.
